ResearchProjectDef.label: toxifier generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create toxifier generators which generate electricity, but also spread pollution around themselves.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->led a clean-up crew to a toxic planetoid
subject_story->learned about toxifiers in the deep sump of a skyripper
subject_story->researched cheap and dirty power sources for an urbcorp

ResearchProjectDef.label: xenogenetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create xenogerms which can be implanted in a person to genetically modify them. Extract genepacks from living people using a gene extractor so you can reimplant their genes into someone else.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was uplifted by a glitterworld charity that focused on the genetically disadvantaged
subject_story->had their genes stolen by a rogue biologist
subject_story->ran a genetic transfer clinic for the glitterworld elite

ResearchProjectDef.label: gene processor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build gene processors, which allow a gene assembler to create xenogerms of higher genetic complexity.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->extracted Glitterworld genes from a drifting derelict
subject_story->processed an entire village to create one set of higher genes
subject_story->began the slow process of uplift by implanting xenogerms into a primitive tribe

ResearchProjectDef.label: archogenetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows a gene assembler to use archite capsules to create seemingly impossible genes. Archite genes and archite capsules can be obtained from traders.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->excavated archite genes from the transcendent moon of Ix
subject_story->made a good living as an archite gene trader
subject_story->led a research expedition to an ancient monolith and returned changed

ResearchProjectDef.label: deathrest
ResearchProjectDef.description: Those with the deathrest gene must periodically undergo a special deathrest coma that lasts several days. This research project allows you to construct buildings which accelerate the deathrest coma and confer specific bonuses on the deathrester. Over time, you can build a grand deathrest temple.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->dissected corpses from a deathrest temple, finally understanding how it worked
subject_story->interviewed a celebrity who never seemed to age, eventually learning her secrets
subject_story->attempted to replicate the technology and fell into a coma, only to wake weeks later

ResearchProjectDef.label: fertility procedures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform the surgeries necessary to create a test tube embryo from a fertile man and woman, then implant the embryo in a surrogate mother or growth vat. Also, perform sterilization surgeries on men and women.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->helped families in the coreworlds achieve their dream of parenthood with test-tube embryos
subject_story->saved the rare Callopian boomrat from extinction with dangerous hand-fertilization techniques
subject_story->solved the population crisis on an urbworld with fertility interventions and growth vats

ResearchProjectDef.label: tox gas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce weapons that utilize caustic tox gas.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->dreamed of a weapon to end all wars
subject_story->skipped ethics classes for extra chemistry practice
subject_story->researched cloud control tech for the tyrannocracy of a deathworld

ResearchProjectDef.label: toxin filtration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft and install bionic organs that can filter out toxins from the environment and from enemy attacks.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->helped milworld combat survivors breathe again
subject_story->skipped chemistry practicals for extra ethics classes
subject_story->joined a mine-corp as a filtration specialist

ResearchProjectDef.label: growth vats
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct growth vats which can gestate an embryo or accelerate a child's growth.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->ran a cloning facility to supply servants for the coreworlds
subject_story->created a new army for a warworld junta
subject_story->helped families of all backgrounds have children
